profile.name: Aditya Kumar
profile.bio: Aspiring full-stack developer and problem solver from MANIT Bhopal. Passionate about building scalable web applications, contributing to open-source, and constantly improving my technical skills through real-world projects and coding platforms.

internships.description: Developed and maintained the official website using React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB. Improved project efficiency by 20% and increased event engagement by 50%. Integrated volunteer data for better resource allocation and planning.
